profile.name: Alex
profile.title: Software Engineer
profile.description:
As a Software Engineer my aim is to create innovative products that can change the way people access information. 

I have been working in national and international projects involving multiple technologies, adapting myself to the requirements of each new task and learning new languages and methodologies. 
I worked for 3 years as a Java Software Engineer including the development of Oracle PLSQL, I spent 2 years as a Full Stack Software Engineer with the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express, AngularJS, and NodeJS) developing a web application for the visualization of Geospatial data. Afterward, I worked on the design and development of the data exploitation tools for the new launch vehicle of the European Space Agency, the Ariane 6. Currently, I am putting my efforts into the processing platform of Rokubun providing precise and affordable navigation solutions. 

In my free time, I am passionate about Science and new technologies.
